original_text: And when you were eating and drinking, were you not just feasting for yourselves?
korean_text: 너희가 먹고 마실 때에 그것은 너희를 위하여 먹고 너희를 위하여 마시는 것이 아니냐

sentences.original_text: And when you were eating and drinking
were you not just feasting for yourselves?
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 단지 자신들을 위해 잔치하지 않더냐?
